entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
